languages.text: {n}Вокс-передатчик щелкает — кто-то еще заходит в канал.{/n} "{name}. Раз эти ничтожества желают видеть меня, я готов снизойти до их мольбы и выслушать, что они хотят сказать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс-передатчик щелкает — кто-то еще заходит в канал.{/n} "{name}. Раз эти ничтожества желают видеть меня, я готов снизойти до их мольбы и выслушать, что они хотят сказать".

languages.text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс-передатчик щелкает — кто-то еще заходит в канал.{/n} "{name}. Раз эти ничтожества желают видеть меня, я готов снизойти до их мольбы и выслушать, что они хотят сказать".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — somebody else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. Since these lowlifes want to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

{n}The vox-caster clicks — somebody else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. Since these lowlifes want to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

{n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

{n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

{n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

languages.text: {n}Der Vox-Transmitter klickt — jemand anders ist der Unterhaltung beigetreten.{/n} "{name}. Wenn der wertlose Abschaum mich unbedingt sehen will, bin ich gerne bereit, ihrem Flehen mein Ohr zu leihen und mir anzuhören, was sie zu sagen haben."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Vox-Transmitter klickt — jemand anders ist der Unterhaltung beigetreten.{/n} "{name}. Wenn der wertlose Abschaum mich unbedingt sehen will, bin ich gerne bereit, ihrem Flehen mein Ohr zu leihen und mir anzuhören, was sie zu sagen haben."

languages.text: {n}通讯器发出了“咔哒”一声，其他人加入了频道。{/n}“{name}，如果那群废物渣滓这么想见我的话，我愿意听听他们的恳求，看看他们有什么要说的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}通讯器发出了“咔哒”一声，其他人加入了频道。{/n}“{name}，如果那群废物渣滓这么想见我的话，我愿意听听他们的恳求，看看他们有什么要说的。”

languages.text: {n}L'émetteur vox produit un cliquetis... Quelqu'un a rejoint la conversation.{/n} « {name}. Puisque ces vauriens insistent tant, je suis prêt à entendre leur plaidoyer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'émetteur vox produit un cliquetis... Quelqu'un a rejoint la conversation.{/n} « {name}. Puisque ces vauriens insistent tant, je suis prêt à entendre leur plaidoyer. »

languages.text: {n}El voco amplificador chasquea. Alguien más se ha unido a la conversación.{/n} «{name}. Si esa chusma inútil tiene tantas ganas de hablar conmigo, estoy dispuesto a escuchar sus súplicas y ver qué quieren decir».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco amplificador chasquea. Alguien más se ha unido a la conversación.{/n} «{name}. Si esa chusma inútil tiene tantas ganas de hablar conmigo, estoy dispuesto a escuchar sus súplicas y ver qué quieren decir».

languages.text: {n}音声通信送受信装置が切り替わり、別の者の声が聞こえる。{/n}「{name}。その下劣なゴミがどうしても俺に会いたいというなら喜んでその願いを聞き入れてやるし、言いたがっていることも聞いてやろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}音声通信送受信装置が切り替わり、別の者の声が聞こえる。{/n}「{name}。その下劣なゴミがどうしても俺に会いたいというなら喜んでその願いを聞き入れてやるし、言いたがっていることも聞いてやろう」

languages.text: {n}Voksyayar tıkırdıyor, konuşmaya biri daha dâhil oluyor.{/n} "{name}. Bu işe yaramaz pislikler beni görmeyi o kadar çok istiyorsa lakırtılarına kulak verip diyeceklerini dinlemek isterim."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster clicks — someone else joins this conversation.{/n} "{name}. If the worthless scum wish to see me so badly, I am willing to lend my ear to their pleas and hear what they have to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voksyayar tıkırdıyor ve konuşmaya biri daha dâhil oluyor.{/n} "{name}. Bu işe yaramaz pislikler beni görmeyi o kadar çok istiyorlarsa, lakırdılarına kulak verip ne diyeceklerini dinlemeye kabulüm."
